body:
Where is this defined? `THBlas_ACCELERATE_sdot_`? is this even defined? I couldn't find it in the codebase.

i think this can be cleaned up properly.
First, TH/CMakeLists.txt:308, add:
```
ELSEIF(BLAS_INFO STREQUAL "accelerate")
    ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DTH_BLAS_ACCELERATE)
```

Then, this section can be cleaned up with:


```
#ifdef TH_BLAS_ACCELERATE
TH_EXTERNC ffloat cblas_sdot(const int n, const float *x, const int incx, const float *y, const int incy);
inline ffloat sdot_(const int *n, const float *x, const int *incx, const float *y, const int *incy)
{
    return cblas_sdot(*n, x, *incx, y, *incy);
}
#else
TH_EXTERNC ffloat sdot_(int *n, float *x, int *incx, float *y, int *incy);
#endif
```
body_html:
Where is this defined? THBlas_ACCELERATE_sdot_? is this even defined? I couldn't find it in the codebase.

i think this can be cleaned up properly.
First, TH/CMakeLists.txt:308, add:

ELSEIF(BLAS_INFO STREQUAL "accelerate")
    ADD_DEFINITIONS(-DTH_BLAS_ACCELERATE)

Then, this section can be cleaned up with:

#ifdef TH_BLAS_ACCELERATE
TH_EXTERNC ffloat cblas_sdot(const int n, const float *x, const int incx, const float *y, const int incy);
inline ffloat sdot_(const int *n, const float *x, const int *incx, const float *y, const int *incy)
{
    return cblas_sdot(*n, x, *incx, y, *incy);
}
#else
TH_EXTERNC ffloat sdot_(int *n, float *x, int *incx, float *y, int *incy);
#endif
